name: text-view---map-filter-incidents-icons-in-right-order;regression-issue-lt506-text-view-browser-chrome-context-chrome-feature-lt25-text-view-lt-273-text-view-of-incidents-capability-lt-25-text-view

tags.name: LT 25 Text View/LT-273 Text View of Incidents

title: Text View - Map filter Incidents icons in right order

testSteps.description: Given I am at the LiveTraffic Website
Then I click on the menu button
Then I click "List View" button from the menu list

Then I should see incident icons displays in below order in Text filter view
| Icon_Name | Icon_Caption |
| crash | Crash |
| breakdown | Breakdown |
| warning | General Hazards |
| traffic-light | Traffic signals |
| roadwork-moderate | Roadworks |
| roadwork | Low impact roadworks |
| info-alt | Changed Traffic Conditions |
| event-major | Public events |
| fire | Fire |
| flood | Flood |
| snow | Snow/Ice |
| adverse-weather | Adverse Weather |
